comment: Kind of like a cordial and a whiskey had a baby that was conceived while they watched White Christmas. The blackberry cordial is the strongest partner in this relationship, but you can tell they have a happy marriage.

It has a bittersweet flavoring that really lingers in your tongue. The blackberry flavoring is just strong enough to stand out but not so sweet that it makes the drink a taste like syrup.

My personal favorite is to mix it with lemonade for a refreshing summertime sipper.
